title: EYL #187 Swim Cap Line Designed for Black Women Disrupts Olympics
itunes:title: EYL #187 Swim Cap Line Designed for Black Women Disrupts Olympics
description:
In episode 187, sat down with Toks Ahmed-Salawudeen, the co-founder of U.K. based Soul Cap. Soul Cap is a swim cap line that was designed black women's hair. 

Soul Cap is a global brand with plans to become one of the top swim lines in the world. Toks spoke to us about how the brand has grown internationally, challenges, e-commerce, marketing, and more. #soulcap #business #swimwear 

EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com

Link for InvestFest: https://investfest.com/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
